title: doc: old release notes links 404
body:
A bunch of links from http://localhost:6060/doc/devel/release.html are old and broken.

I notice that public URLs like http://golang.org/pkg/http/ redirect to their modern
equivalents, but that behavior isn't in cmd/godoc itself?  Is it just in our App Engine
version?

Should we make these links redirect?

= 404 (from [http://localhost:6060/doc/devel/release.html])
